Learning_Content_SubscriptionObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Learning_Content_SubscriptionObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Learning_Content_SubscriptionObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: Reference for the Learning Content Subscription.

Specifies if the Learning Content Subscription is Inactive.

Learning_Content_SubscriberObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
